title: Prescott or Carr? Sides or Desserts? Star Wars and Patriots; Steve Mariucci; Bills problems
itunes:title: Prescott or Carr? Sides or Desserts? Star Wars and Patriots; Steve Mariucci; Bills problems
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara explore which quarterback will have the bigger game on Thanksgiving: Derek Carr or Dak Prescott; then they debate which is the better part of the Thanksgiving meal: sides or desserts; and they discuss which duo will dominate on Thanksgiving. Kyle leads a star wars segment about the New England Patriots and lastly, they're joined by Steve Mariucci, and he shares the strangest thing he's ever seen on the football field.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
